title: Cryptogreatdane
author: Cryptogreatdane
created_time: August 26, 2022, 09:49:52 PMLast edit: July 11, 2024, 07:20:48 AM by Cryptogreatdane
content: Whats up family. So ive been planning and working on this for awhile. It always bothered me that all the physical bitcoin videos were lame, wrong, or just plain bad. So I did it myself. The goal is to bring physical to the world. Hopefully inform the newbies and prevent people from getting scammed. Â The format is each video will talk about a different physical bitcoin. I hope to have some of the coinmakers even come on to talk about their coin. Even some guest hosts from the forum phone in and help. Plenty of you know more than me. By no means are these videos perfect. I definitely would like feedback, and Im not scared of criticism. So please let me have it.Thanks Dane https://youtube.com/channel/UCG0jGst7o-xiXpn6qitEwGQCardsmiths Currency Series 2 Sneak Peekhttps://youtu.be/MHaVNvbnthYSatori Chip and Bitflyerhttps://youtu.be/-Cmsctrkoo4Private Key protection in physical bitcoin (with Krogoth)https://youtu.be/d9jSLaDwL5s?si=XNWg1WlDYSv9GerBLealana Grim Reaper coinhttps://youtu.be/ODgAlWnkHD8?si=5iD7Ko03zERS4rhvCardsmiths Series 2 updates and reviewhttps://youtu.be/cjP4hj_QLw4?si=eZL8LHOEUukQY51f200 million dollar buried bitcoin treasurehttps://youtu.be/re0lhfX9TNo?si=9lm0kRspLDojkTUSCardsmiths currency episode #1https://youtu.be/U9HT9UF3A34?si=G4nb-Dh1r77O9aKy

comments.author: MrCryptHodl
comments.body: Hi my friends ! hope you're fine ! Â Firstly sorry I have no more merit otherwise I would have given you 10!I just watched your first video, I find the format very pleasant, and the concept very well thought out. Beautiful ! I really like your videos!I find that your explanations are clear and simple (afterwards I am not the best to judge at this level because I do not think I have the best English here, far from it), and it's nice to hear from you too! Â In terms of the youtube game, the decor is rather effective for my taste (by the way, a big thank you for showing the book "Bitcoin attack"!), In the future, of course, you could use a camera, a microphone and lighting to level up the viewer experience! Even if it's going very well right now! these are just details!Indeed the idea of â€‹â€‹bringing coinmakers or even collectors in IRL or via various audio discussion platforms such as Discord so that they present their collectibles and talk about their background is a very good idea!In any case, congratulations for this start! it is with pleasure that I will share your videos so that new people discover your channel! can't wait to see more!

Even if it's going very well right now! these are just details!Indeed the idea of â€‹â€‹bringing coinmakers or even collectors in IRL or via various audio discussion platforms such as Discord so that they present their collectibles and talk about their background is a very good idea!In any case, congratulations for this start! it is with pleasure that I will share your videos so that new people discover your channel! can't wait to see more! absolutely yes. Microphone, lighting and better editing equipment is on the list. Wanted to feel it out first. When its time for the hodl video ill reach out prior. Thanks for the feedback

comments.body: Quote from: Cryptogreatdane on August 26, 2022, 09:49:52 PMWhats up family. So ive been planning and working on this for awhile. It always bothered me that all the physical bitcoin videos were lame, wrong, or just plain bad. So I did it myself. The goal is to bring physical to the world. Hopefully inform the newbies and prevent people from getting scammed.Â  The format is each video will talk about a different physical bitcoin. I hope to have some of the coinmakers even come on to talk about their coin. Even some guest hosts from the forum phone in and help. Plenty of you know more than me. By no means are these videos perfect. I definitely would like feedback, and Im not scared of criticism. So please let me have it.Thanks Dane https://youtube.com/channel/UCG0jGst7o-xiXpn6qitEwGQI've just watched some of your videos, and I'd have to say they're pretty good. This was much needed to help increase exposure of physical crypto collectibles. I also like the idea of inviting coin makers for an interview. Great job, buddy.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: Frank AlpenCoin on August 27, 2022, 07:03:32 AMExcellent idea!Waiting for the microsoul episode!You could also interview OG!Good luckSeems like a good idea. Iâ€™ll have to check out the channel and see if I can learn a thing or two. Great to see the community taking good steps forward. It feels almost friendly around here these days, which is nice for everyone as we grow our hobby.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: I want to thank everyone for the support. After i posted i wasnt sure if i was going to delete them or keep making them. Its been great to hear so much positive feedback. I plan on making many more videos. If you're a coinmaker i will definitely reach out to you prior to your video to see if you want to be involved. For most of the members of this forum these videos are elementary, but for the rest of the world a resource that hopefully brings them into our world.Â Thanks to all, look for the Lealana video this weekDane

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: congratulations for the idea and for the final result! I also like the collection behind you, really a great example for anyone starting out in this world. In any collector's niche YT views are just small number but your video could reach a bigger audience. It's just matter of time but I think more and more collectors will join this field.I would like to tell you this topic [Interviews] with crypto Collectors / Artists Â where I "made" some interviews with collectors and creators, feel free to take inspiration  and of course to take part and release your INTERVIEW

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Awesome, keep it up!Hope you can also reach some of the crypto-enthusiats not yet exposed to the awesome world of collectibles.May shoot you a pm later regarding a Moonbits privkey test, if you are interested.

It's just matter of time but I think more and more collectors will join this field.I would like to tell you this topic [Interviews] with crypto Collectors / Artists Â where I "made" some interviews with collectors and creators, feel free to take inspiration  and of course to take part and release your INTERVIEW Yes interesting art pieces behind you dane, and looks like there are more out of shot, itmight be an idea to swap them about from episode to episode, although you have probably started already ...Anyway this is great, great start, great idea and very interesting. it means for us who are not well educated in the top collectibles we dont have to thrawl through threads and websites looking for info, YOU ARE GOING TO DO IT FOR US - nice!
